metadata.title: Rapid Antigen Tests for Diagnosis of Pandemic (Swine) Influenza A/H1N1

abstract.original_text: We found that the sensitivities of 3 rapid influenza antigen tests for pandemic influenza A/H1N1 virus were low to moderate: BD Directigen EZ Flu A+B test (Becton Dickinson), 46.7%; BinaxNOW Influenza A&B (Inverness Medical), 38.3%; and QuickVue Influenza A+B Test (Quidel), 53.3%. A patient with influenza-like illness who has a negative rapid antigen test result should undergo further testing using reverse-transcription polymerase chain reaction.

sentences.segment_text: We found that the sensitivities of 3 rapid influenza antigen tests for pandemic influenza A/H1N1 virus were low to moderate : BD Directigen EZ Flu A+B test ( Becton Dickinson ) ,
38.3 % ; and QuickVue Influenza A+B Test ( Quidel ) , 53.3 % .
A patient with influenza-like illness who has a negative rapid antigen test result should undergo further testing using reverse-transcription polymerase chain reaction .
